function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential presence of viral genomes in sewage","Impact":"Risk of disease transmission through sewage contamination","Mitigation":"Regular testing of sewage for viral genomes, implementing sewage treatment processes","Technologies":"Sewage treatment technologies, viral genome testing kits","People":"Public, workers in sewage treatment plants, public health officials","Owner":"Public health authorities, sewage treatment companies"},{"Description":"Uncertainty in viral load estimates in sewage and stool","Impact":"Inaccurate assessment of disease prevalence and transmission risk","Mitigation":"Conducting additional experiments to calibrate viral load estimates, improving testing methods","Technologies":"Advanced testing methods for viral load estimation, experimental calibration tools","People":"Public health researchers, scientists, public health officials","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Large variation in viral load in stool samples","Impact":"Challenges in accurately assessing disease prevalence and transmission risk","Mitigation":"Utilizing a range of viral load estimates, conducting extensive sampling and testing","Technologies":"Advanced testing methods for viral load estimation, extensive sampling and testing tools","People":"Public health researchers, epidemiologists, public health officials","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"}]}
